trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element used in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 表す、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> XML 暗号化に使用される要素。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: このクラスは継承できません。

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class represents the `<ReferenceList>` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification.
trans-unit.target: Referencelist を指定のクラスを表す、 `<ReferenceList>` XML 暗号化の仕様で定義されている暗号化されたドキュメントの XML 署名の要素。

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class contains references to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: 参照クラスにはへの参照が含まれています<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>と<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>別内に含まれるキーによって暗号化された要素<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>要素</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>。

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class uses <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elements, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: 参照クラス使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>要素を参照<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>要素、および<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>要素を参照<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>要素</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>。

trans-unit.source: You can add only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> objects to the ReferenceList collection.
trans-unit.target: のみを追加することができます<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>または<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>referencelist を指定のコレクションにオブジェクト</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
trans-unit.target: XML 暗号化の規格の詳細については、http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core を参照してください。
